reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater warm without being bulky, with a nicely made knitted exterior and super soft interior. They appreciate its comfort, appearance, and color, particularly noting the neutral gray and festive red options. The fit and fleece lining receive mixed feedback - while some say it runs true to size, others find it runs large, and while some like the lining, others say it's not fleece-lined.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of My Favorite Pieces of Clothing!
items.body: This went from being something I wore to work when I wanted to look a little bit nicer but needed to keep warm to being something that I wear almost every day and even will put over myself at home like a blanket when it is cold because it is SO comfortable and cozy. I normally don't like hoods because they make me feel claustrophobic, but when I see it start to rain I pull this one up and its over-sized hood covers my whole head while still giving me space to look around. The big pockets are great for putting my personal AND work phones in while I am out and about and if needed keys, wallets, and everything else I need for the afternoon. I work as a social worker with crisis and highly acute clients in the field so I am out and about in some serious/dangerous circumstances in a wide variety of weather conditions. This is what I wear to both look professional enough that people recognize that I work with mental health but not scary like I am a cop or a DA prosecutor so clients are comfortable. It is also what keeps me at the correct temperature. If it is warmer I leave the front open, when it gets colder I fold the front around myself doubling it up. Oh and the color is neutral gray - not one with hidden blue or other tones in which can happen with grays you wear them so it matches almost everything. I am going to buy one in green now also. The only reason I didn't give it a 5... and I still think maybe I should, ah heck I am going to... Is that it is pilling a bit faster than I would have liked. I have been wearing it only a year and looks a little shabby, but then again I wear clothes hard and I live in a climate where I wear it 8-9 months of the year. It is fixable also, just needs a quick de-piling. The temperatures where I live are 35f/0c - 65f/18c year round. As far as size, I bought a XXL and I am 5'7", carry most of my weight around my middle, and when I bought it I was a size 20W and it was plenty big enough with extra room. Now I am a size 16 and it is huge. It is extra long which I like and sometimes when I am reaching in my pocket it just goes lower and lower and lowers and I have to grab it and pull them up to me because of how long it is but again, I like long things. I highly recommend it to anyone who loves being cozy and gets cold easily or to anyone who just needs a nice sweater with some extra warmth. Read more
items.author: MEAP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater hooded Feece jacket
items.body: The Sidefeel Women's Cardigan Sweater Hoodie is an absolute gem! After purchasing one for myself, I was so impressed that I had to buy one for my grandma, who loved it just as much. The cozy design and stylish look make it a fantastic addition to any wardrobe. When my daughter saw how adorable it looked on Grandma and me, she insisted on having one too! It’s truly a versatile piece that appeals to all ages, making it a great option for family members across generations. The cardigan is not only fashionable but also practical, featuring a button-down front and convenient pockets that add to its functionality. In terms of fit, it runs true to size, which is a huge plus. The material is comfortable and warm, perfect for those chilly winter days. I love how effortlessly it can be dressed up or down, making it suitable for various occasions. Overall, I highly recommend the Sidefeel Women's Cardigan Sweater Hoodie. It's a stylish, cozy, and functional piece that everyone in the family can enjoy. It’s clear why it has become a favorite among us! Read more
items.author: Beth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Peach not pink
items.body: Loved the sweater. Very soft and warm. I really disliked the color. It was described as pink but it's more like peach. Not my color. In my opinion it runs a little large. Read more
items.author: Angela R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, warm sweater!
items.body: Love this sweater! It's not generously sized, considering it is worn over clothing, but is well made. The length is nice at mid-rump and even the sleeves are lined! Great value for the price! Read more
items.author: Barbara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect winter sweater jacket
items.body: Love this sweater jacket. My medium size fits perfectly. Love the color and warmth it provides. Read more
items.author: Marysue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satisfaction of an item
items.body: delivery was. The sweater is really a bang for the buck very lovely and cozy. Read more
items.author: Randall H Gremel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan
items.body: The fit is good except for the upper arm on the sleeves. It's a little tight. Read more
items.author: c.r.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love this sweater
items.body: I can’t say enough about this sweater, this sweater is so warm. It is so thick. It has an extra layer inside. I swear it feels like wool and it keeps you so warm when you’re outside. I just love it. I love it so much. I got it in another color and I plan on getting it in one more. It goes with so many things and it’s so cute with everything I am. 5”1” 130 lbs and I got a medium Read more
items.author: Michellet4830

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hooded 22 Blue, Hooded 22 Gray, Hooded Deep 21 Black, Deep Gray, Black, Hooded White, Hooded Pink, Hooded 21 Brown, Hooded Beige, Hooded 21 Purple, Hooded 21 Sky Blue, Hooded Hot Pink, Hooded Purple, Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
